Spirit V2.5.9 (Boost V1.78.0)

  • Improved headers self-sufficiency. GH#695
  • Removed unneeded boost/foreach.hpp include.
  • Fortified against min and max macros. GH#697
  • Deprecated Phoenix V2 transition headers (boost/spirit/include/phoenix*.hpp). GH#699
  • Fixed potential UB in hold_any (-Wundefined-reinterpret-cast warnings).
  • Fixed swapped parameters to is_substitute. GH#702 GH#701 GH#679
